EmailTemplate.subject: DOCTOR EVIDENCE TRAINING INVITATION
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence Upcoming DOC Search Trainings|*
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Are you interested in learning how to maximize your use of the Doctor Evidence platforms? Attend our Monthly User Workshop for hands-on assistance on any of the Doctor Evidence platforms.
Learn to: Use DOC Search to conduct Rapid Assessments, monitor new literature for adverse events, identify research gaps, create feasibility reports on a research project, create signals for daily literature surveillance and more. Use DOC Label to search, browse, and compare labels with simple or complex keywords, create automatic alerts, and view side-by-side results of multiple labels in an interactive search environment. Use DOC Library to access, annotate, rate and share custom library packages. Use DOC Data to filter relevant variables in preparation for analysis, to create evidence tables and to export data for presentations and other uses. SCHEDULE: 2 Aug 2018 | 10-11 AM EST | 4-5 PM CET | 13 Sept 2018 | 10-11 AM EST | 4-5 PM CET | 4 Oct 2018 | 10-11 AM EST | 4-5 PM CET |
ASIA TIME ZONE: 21 Sept 2018 | 9-10 AM GMT+8|
Please respond to this invitation with the date(s) of the workshops you would like to attend. You will receive a calendar invite for as many events as you would like. Feel free to drop in!.
Kind Regards,
Nancy Morgan Vice President, Learning and Development 301 Arizona Ave Suite 301 Santa Monica CA 90401 Doctor Evidence
Doctor Evidence (DRE) is a technology and research services company that finds, synthesizes and analyzes information from published sources. We will work with you--at no cost--to create deliverables such as Systematic Literature Reviews, Meta-Analyses, Landscape Analyses, Comparative Safety Assessments, and Regulatory Responses across several therapeutic areas: Cardiovascular, Diabetes, Immunology, Multiple Sclerosis, General Medicines (including Consumer Health), Vaccines and Oncology.
